Plainknit¶

Methods for everything sourrunded a plainknit-strickgraph.

increaser from file as in plainknit_increaser_file

createcloth.plainknit.plainknit_increaser_file = 'plainknit_increaser.pickle'¶

file to load increaser from

Description of plainknit¶

That means every Strixkgraph only consisting mainly of knit stitches. starting and ending with yarnovers and bindoffs. So that the Strickstueck can increase and extend from row to row, at the sites, there can be yarnover for increase and k2tog for decrease. for strong also possible isthat the sderow hs on both sides yarnover or bindoff.

Used states¶

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.decrease: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = decrease¶

row with left and right 3rd position k2tog and else only knits. k2tog is for decrease.

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.end: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = end¶

endrow with only bindoff

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.enddecrease: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = enddecrease¶

endrow wizh left and right 3rd position bind2off and else only bindoff

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.increase: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = increase¶

row with left and right 3rd position yarnover and else only knits. yarnover is for increase.

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.lefteaves: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = lefteaves¶

row with mainly knit but on zje left side yarnover for increase

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.leftplane: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = leftplane¶

row with mainly knit but on the left side bindoff for decrease

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.plain: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = plain¶

row with only knit

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.righteaves: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = righteaves¶

row with mainly knit but on the right side yarnover for increase

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.rightplane: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = rightplane¶

row with mainly knit but on the right side bindoff for decrease

createcloth.plainknit.examplestates.start: createcloth.plainknit.state.rowstate = start¶

Startrow with only yarnover
